body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Christopher Reed and I'm a customer service agent at Bright Auto Solutions. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. In order to assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. Can you also confirm your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's six one five - four five six - seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Madison. How can I assist you today with your experience at our Car Dealership related to pricing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the pricing options provided to me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Madison. Your feedback is valuable. Let's work together to find a solution. Thank you for your time and patience today.
